name: Roll With It (studio-19)
description:
Synopsis

You are Daniel D., a character from the video game themed board game, Roll With It. The game involves heavy use of 12 sided-dice to determine random outcomes, some for the better, some not. How long can you survive the onslaught of randomness?

Controls

WASD: Move player

Space: Roll/Temporary invincibility

Objective

Survive for as long as possible with all the die determining your fate.

Rate Game

If you so choose, we would appreciate you rating our game for the GMTK Jam 2022! You may do so here.
